derivation: or דּוֹשׁ; or דִּישׁ; a primitive root;
outline:
1. to tread out, thresh
    1. (Qal) to tread on, trample on, thresh
    2. (Niphal) to be trampled down
    3. (Hophal) to be threshed
kjv_def: break, tear, thresh, tread out (down), at grass (Jeremiah 50:11, by mistake for H1877 (דֶּשֶׁא)).
